channel.title: How you put in a command that lets u switch books to ancients?
channel.description:
like ::switch
i went on some one elses server, and he had that command, and anctines owned... i would like to do this too

item.title: How you put in a command that lets u switch books to ancients?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

if (command.startsWith("switch")){
NpcDialogue = 0;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
animation(435, absY, absX);
RemoveAllWindows();
if (ancients == 1) {
setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855);
ancients = 0;
sendMessage("You convert to normal magic!");
} else {
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855);
ancients = 1;
sendMessage("You convert to ancient magicks!");
}
}

lul…

After taking that out of a source, i realized thats pointless… ancients = 1…

It’s liek a quest or sumit…

Add

public int ancients;

Read full topic
item.source: How you put in a command that lets u switch books to ancients?
